mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from reviewBoard where postDisable = 0 and petType = #{petType}
mapper.update: update reviewBoard set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, petName = #{petName} , petType = #{petType}, petImg = #{petImg} where postId = #{postId}
update reviewBoard set postDisable = 1 where postId = #{postId}
update reviewBoard set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where postId = #{value}
update reviewBoard set postreportcnt = postreportcnt + 1 where postId = #{value}
